interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AISI QUEENS Black Wigs for Women Long Wavy Curly Synthetic Lace Front Wig Middle Part Body Wavy Hair Replacement Wigs Heat Resistant Fibers for Daily Party Use
Review Date: 2021/11/05
Store: AISI QUEENS
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Package Dimensions': '10.75 x 9.09 x 2.72 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love this lace front wig, it came with wig caps and was easy to trim the lace where I needed it. This would be a great wig for daily wear or cosplay, if you’re doing daily wear I’d suggest thinning it a little unless you like the fuller appearance. On me it looks like too much volume so i used thinning scissors and corrected that and then was able to apply the wig and wear it without issue! It looks great and realistic.
Review Title: Cute wig for a great price, easy to wear
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} Pros: it came with everything pictured, a lash applicator, the tube of “eyeliner glue” and 5 pairs of lashes in varying thickness. The box itself was nicely packaged. For reference, I used the thinnest/most natural pair at the top for my review.

Cons: the tube of eyeliner was either sitting so long it completely dried up, or the glue caused the eyeliner to adhere to the inside of the tube, but it was almost impossible to get ANY of the liner on my lid.

When I finally got a line to go on, it was akin to what attempting to using a dried up Expo on whiteboard looks like- I had to scrub the pen on my eyelid in an attempt to lay down any product at all, resulting in a very pitiful looking eyeliner application.

I fixed the lashes to the appropriate area, and within 5 minutes they were coming off at the corners. I tried to remedy the overall result somewhat by adding my own liner, and that example is on the second photo, bottom right corner (photo with eyeshadow applied).

The lashes themselves were the quality you’d expect from a multi pack at this price. Some of the individual lashes had fallen out as I opened the package as well.

Final thoughts: just use eyelash glue and get quality lashes. It doesn’t take any more time to apply and at least you can apply eyeliner to suit your taste. Glue + Eyeliner probably shouldn’t mix 7JHH WIGS Long Wavy Curly Wig With Bangs Natural Hair Dye Wig for Women (25inch, Red) 7JHH WIGS {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Brand': '7JHH WIGS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '682601933330'} This wig is nice but a little thin, the value for money is great though. The bangs especially are really cute if you get them positioned correctly. Nice wig, a little thin OULAC Shine to Shine Velvet Matte Lipstick, Long Lasting Creamy Formula, Opaque Finish, Vegan Friendly, 3.6 grams / 0.12 ounces, Cranberries (Y09) Oulac {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 0.68 x 0.68 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'velvet-matte-Y09'} This lipstick is gorgeous! Applies very easily and comes in a steel lipstick container that seems very durable. Super cute packaging and the product goes on without issue. It does smudge some but as it’s not a matte product that’s to be expected, it’s also not drying and feels great on the lips for all day wear. Beautiful, vibrant colors with nice smell OULAC Blush Mono 4.8g/0.16oz (One More time) OUL'AC ['Smooth Glide', ': A silky, superfine blush delivers a burst of buildable colors that are designed for every skin tone. Vegan Friendly!'] {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Brand': "OUL'AC", 'Skin Tone': 'All'} This blush is beautiful! It’s a soft pink color that goes on easily and is smooth and creamy when applying. It’s easy to build the color up to the desired effect and stays on without fading for hours. profile:
The user exhibits a strong interest in beauty products that prioritize practicality and ease of use, particularly in categories such as eyelashes, eyeliner, and lip products. They favor convenience and self-adhesive items but often lean towards traditional adhesive options due to past disappointments with product performance. Their appreciation for diverse styles and attractive packaging is balanced by a critical approach, ensuring that quality and usability take precedence over budget-friendly options.

Recently, the user has expanded their interests to include hair products, particularly wigs, and they value design and realism in the items they choose. They have expressed a positive experience with their latest purchase, noting ease of application and the ability to customize the look for everyday wear, which aligns with their overall emphasis on functionality.

Their ongoing exploration of high-quality lip products has yielded favorable evaluations regarding ease of application and durability, despite minor smudging. Additionally, a recent acquisition of blush highlights their focus on effective and luxurious beauty solutions, praised for smooth application, buildable coverage, and lasting finish. This pattern of behavior emphasizes their desire for beauty products that blend aesthetics with functionality, providing comfort and usability in their routines, while remaining open to investing in items that meet or exceed their expectations.
